about_the_game:
Descensus is a souls-like action-RPG with challenging combat set in post-catastrophe diesel punk world. The player's goal is to reach the heart of the mysterious Rift of the Fallen Star – a grandiose tear in the world appeared as a result of a catastrophe and changed the world beyond recognition breaking laws of universe and converting the world around into an anomalous zone. It is necessary to stop the expansion and spread of the anomaly before it absorbs the whole world.
Start your descent into the rift – the physical and metaphysical tear in the fabric of the world. Rise and fall until you reach the Seeker`s base.

Game features:


Perfect challenging combat system combining melee and ranged weapons
Beloved challenging soulslike combat in isometric view allowing for more control over the battleground. Master the combination of melee and ranged weapon to stand against the spawn of the Rift.
Become a legendary seeker
Choose between different weapons, collect items providing different opportunities in combat, create devices based on the Rift anomalies. Obtain morphosis – anomalous changes, which make your character even stronger.
Descent into the Rift of the Fallen star, mysterious zone full of anomalies
Explore the Rift, which in the past were part of the surface, and now have become the world of distorted reality. The deeper you descent, the more horrible and abnormal are the changes.
Rise and Fall
The death is not way out in the Rift. If your body can not continue the descent, be reborn next to the last meteorite you imprinted yourself. You can go to the place of death to regain the lost Ethereal energy. Remember that you have one chance. If you die again, it will dissipate.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad core 2.6GHz x64-compatible
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 Ti or ATI Radeon™ HD 7850
